tasks.label: AtCoder Test
args: contest=$(basename $(dirname $(dirname $(dirname "${file}")))); problem=$(basename "${file}" .rs); tmp=$(mktemp -d) && oj d -d "$tmp" -s https://atcoder.jp/contests/${contest}/tasks/${contest}_${problem} && cd ${contest} && oj t -d "$tmp" -c "cargo run --bin ${problem}" && rm -r "$tmp"
